meta.title: Our 6th Anniversary
meta.subtitle: A little journey made just for you
meta.passcodeHint: Hint: the day we said 'I do'

storyCards.caption: Every big love story starts with one small hello.
storyCards.noteBody: I still remember that first spark. It felt simple, and still unforgettable.

storyCards.caption: From long talks to longer dreams.
storyCards.noteBody: Somewhere between laughter and late-night conversations, you became my home.

storyCards.caption: We made promises and built a life around them.
storyCards.noteBody: That day was beautiful, but the real gift is everything that came after.

storyCards.caption: Trips, milestones, and tiny ordinary moments.
storyCards.noteBody: You make every place better, and every day brighter, simply by being there.

storyCards.caption: Even the hard days became softer with you.
storyCards.noteBody: Thank you for believing in us, and for choosing love in all its forms.

storyCards.caption: Six years later, I would still choose you.
storyCards.noteBody: Happy anniversary, my love. This is only chapter six of forever.

quiz.question: What is my favorite thing about us?

quiz.question: What would I choose in every lifetime?

surprise.envelopeMessage: Happy 6th anniversary. Thank you for every hug, every laugh, every small moment, and every dream we built together. You are the best part of my life, and I love you more with every year.
